text: Events in the year 1972 in Spain. ==Incumbents== *Caudillo: Francisco Franco ==Births== * Montse Ribé. * 20 September - Ramon Tribulietx. ==Deaths== *23 March - Cristóbal Balenciaga. ==See also== * List of Spanish films of 1972 ==References== Category:Years of the 20th century in Spain Category:1970s in Spain Spain Spain
title: 1972 in Spain
